name: Piano Pink Master - Color Tile
description:
Piano Pink Master is an app designed to help you develop interests in piano.Even you don't have any basic knowledge in piano ,you still can play classical and pop piano songs with interesting game mode. This app is easy to use but hard to master. It is mainly designed for girls and guy who love pink theme.

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a professional pianist like Beethoven, Chopin or Mozart? Now you have the chance to make your dream come true. With piano pink master,
you can play many classical and pop piano songs. You can challenge these famous piano master and play these songs easily.

Have you tired of traditional piano app, black tiles ,white tiles,reading piano music sheet?
We made it novel. You can play piano easily with game mode, meanwhile, we add pink color into it.Pink is favorite color for girls. We designed this especially for girls,kids and guys who love pink color and piano. You will have a different feeling with this app. It will make you have interests in piano. You don't need to have professional knowledge of piano. Just enjoy the classic songs and beautiful melody, relax your soul with piano pink master.

How to play:
1. Select your favorite song in song list book
2. Press the correct keys of piano keyboard when note tiles fall. Don't miss it.
3. Blue notes for white tiles, green notes for black tiles.
4. Hold piano keys for different time slice basing on note length. Time is important.
5. The more scores you get, the more rewards you will get.
6. Unlock more songs with diamonds

Key Features:
- 88 key piano keyboard
- Awesome design and graphics : pink theme
- High quality piano music sound
- Play piano offline
- Easy control

Most Popular Songs:
- Little Star
- Canon
- For Alice
- Swan Lake
- Turkey March
- Green Sleeves
- Kiss The Rain
- River Flows in You
- Faded
- Despacito

Support
We’re always trying to make our Piano game app better so if you have questions or suggestions, please share them with us! PianoNoteGo@gmail.com.

Piano Pink Master is for ever free. You can play anytime anywhere even you don't have network. If you like pink color , also you like piano, girls , come to download this app. Be a piano master. Enjoy piano songs and relax yourself.
